extension.name: Authentication - Master User
extension.author: Spiral Scripts
extension.copyright: (C) 2013 copyright Spiral Scripts. All rights reserved.
extension.description: As a Master User, you can log in as another user in the system. This version of the plugin is compatible with version 2.5 and above of Joomla

field.name: restrict_ip
field.label: Restrict by IP Address
field.description: Limit access as master user by IP address

field.name: ip_addresses
field.label: Valid IP Addresses
field.description: Enter IP addresses as comma separated list to restrict Master User login access by IP

field.name: enable_all
field.label: Enable by group
field.description: Allow all users in selected group (usually administrators, but you can change this using the advanced options) to log in as master user. If you check 'no', only those with listed ids will be able to.

field.name: master_ids
field.label: Master User Ids
field.description: Allow master user for listed user ids. Can be single id or comma-separated list. The id must belong to a master user group (usually an administrator or super-administrator, but you can change this using the advanced options).

field.name: no_login_usergroups
field.label: Restricted User Groups
field.description: Master Users cannot log in as users in these groups. Unless you have been messing with the admin groups on your site leave this option alone. By default it is set to the groups 7 and 8 administrator and super administrator groups.

field.name: master_usergroups
field.label: Master User Groups
field.description: The master user groups - it is important that this is set correctly for security. If you have set the enable by group option to yes, then all users in these groups will be able to act as a master user. By default it is set to the groups 7 and 8 administrator and super administrator groups. However you might think about creating a special user group that has no other privileges.
